Directives > ui-busy-indicator

busy indicator - Full screen

Show 

<ui-busy-indicator show-busy-indicator="showBusyIndicator" full-screen="fullScreen"></ui-busy-indicator>

busy indicator - Inside a container

show hide 

<ui-busy-indicator show-busy-indicator="showBusyIndicator"></ui-busy-indicator>

busy-indicator Options

Name type description
showBusyIndicator boolean Show/Hide the busy indicator.
fullScreen boolean Show the busy indicator in full screen mode.
